item.title: How To Import Modules in Python 3
item.description: Introduction The Python programming language comes with a variety of built-in functions.

item.title: macOS設定Python3.8-VSCode開發環境
item.description: 1. macOS 上安裝 Python3.8 如果你的macOS已經是最新版本的話，預設下應該已經安裝好Python3.8 如果沒有的話，我們可以透過Brew來安裝 brew install python3 brew upgrade python@3.

item.description: Introduction Object-oriented programming allows for variables to be used at the class level or the instance level.

item.title: Understanding Class Inheritance in Python 3
item.description: Introduction Object-oriented programming creates reusable patterns of code to curtail redundancy in development projects.
